channel.title: Comments on: Design update and manpage

item.title: By: nic
item.dc:creator: nic
item.description: I think putting the whole manual on one page is a little too much. Can't you split that up into multiple pages?
item.content:encoded: I think putting the whole manual on one page is a little too much. Can’t you split that up into multiple pages?

item.title: By: hagen
item.dc:creator: hagen
item.description: Thank you, I have fixed it.

item.title: By: Leandro
item.dc:creator: Leandro
item.description: You said: "For example have a look at the placing of a text label." I think that the link in text "label" is broken. Take a look.
item.content:encoded:
You said: “For example have a look at the placing of a text label.”
I think that the link in text “label” is broken. Take a look.
